overview: When a burglar tries robbing an old lady's house, she winds up killing him and burying him in the back yard. After she dies some teenagers move into her house, not knowing about the burglar buried out back. One night they hold a s√©ance and, unbeknownst to them, the burglar comes back to life. Complications ensue.
tagline: Frank the Tank is from Hell...The Burglar from Hell.
title: Burglar from Hell
